title: Spooge: The Sex & Love Monologues
description: 22 Monologues.Cast Varies. A comic meditation on the sexual instinct, from boys to girls, men to women, same-sex to shoe-sex, from candlelit romance to straight out humping. The Sex & Love Monologues has it all. SPOOGE is a lacerating, humorous examination of lust and love, a wacky sexual journey through the dirty thoughts everyone has but few will be willing to admit.
author: Joshua  James
